basics.name: Jérémy Buget
basics.label: Principal / Staff Engineer – Full-stack & Architecture
basics.summary: Senior software engineer passionate about development, architecture, and technical mentoring. 20+ years of experience across back-end, front-end, and infrastructure. Skilled in designing and delivering complex, robust, and scalable web applications, while closely supporting teams in technical decision-making, organization, and best practices.

work.name: La Plateforme de l'inclusion
work.summary: Led and contributed directly to the design, development, and maintenance of public service platforms (Python/Django, TypeScript/SvelteKit, PostgreSQL, Redis). Hands-on coding on critical projects (new features, complex migrations, API integrations, automation). Designed and deployed secure, scalable architectures on Scalingo, Clever Cloud, and Scaleway. Implemented DevOps tooling and CI/CD pipelines, improved performance, reduced technical debt, and introduced automated testing. Provided close technical mentoring to teams through pair programming, code reviews, application design guidance, and best practices.
highlights: Regular code contributions (features, bug fixes, refactoring)
Designed and implemented new APIs and integrations
Set up DevOps tooling and CI/CD pipelines

work.name: Pix
work.summary: Co-founder and principal technical architect of Pix, the French public platform for digital skills assessment and certification. Hands-on full-stack development: back-end (Node.js/Hapi.js, PostgreSQL, Redis) and front-end (Ember, Nuxt/Vue). Designed and implemented a modular, highly available architecture deployed on Scalingo and AWS, with CI/CD pipelines and automation. Supervised and contributed to critical developments (security, performance, accessibility, interoperability). Provided technical leadership and coaching for product teams, ensuring strong software architecture and code quality.
highlights: Full-stack development and production deployment of new features
Optimized PostgreSQL database and tuned queries
Built complex API integrations and automation pipelines
Coached and mentored multidisciplinary product teams

work.name: OCTO Technology
work.summary: Technical leadership and development of complex front-end web applications (Vue.js, Ember.js, Backbone.js). Introduced best practices (TDD, CI/CD, DDD) and supported client teams in adopting modern web development approaches.

work.name: OCTO Technology
work.summary: Tech lead and lead developer on several web projects built from scratch (Java, Node.js, PostgreSQL). Provided agile coaching and technical training.

work.name: VISEO
